message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
You wanted a fair split, I'll give you a fair split. But I'll make it a bit sweeter for me this time.
You said it was a fair split, but I think I deserve a bit more this time. Can you meet me in the middle?
You want to meet in the middle? I'll meet you in the middle, but I'm taking a slightly larger share this time.
I'm not budging on the $1,000 difference. Meet me at this number, or we'll keep negotiating.
You're not budging, I won't budge either. I'll meet you at this number, but I'm not going any lower.
